# install.packages("tidyverse")

library("tidyverse")

#### 冲突的产生以及处理

```{r}
# install.packages("conflicted")
library(conflicted)
library("stats")

# 设置冲突处理策略
conflicted::conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")
conflicted::conflict_prefer("lag", "dplyr")
```
